title: Gemini Ai
description: Gemini ai provides a user allowing users to ask questions and receive responses just like they would with the real Gemini.

title: Ecommerce
description: Carastore is a responsive e-commerce website frontend built with Html, CSS & JavaScript

title: Moviehub
description: Moviehub is a ReactJS-based web app that provides users with information about the latest movies.

title: Thought Spot
description: Users can post their thoughts along with their names (optional) and browse through the thoughts of others.

title: Google Clone
description: Google clone allows users to enter search queries and displays relevant results, similar to the familiar Google experience
